cast.name: 安德尔斯·伯格 Anders Berg
桑德拉·安德雷伊斯 Sandra Andreis

awards:
第70届威尼斯电影节(2013)
　　费比西奖(国际影评人联盟奖) 地平线单元及国际影评人周奖 安娜·奥德尔
　　欧洲电影联盟奖-特别提及 国际电影评论周单元 安娜·奥德尔

　　第18届釜山国际电影节(2013)
　　未来景象奖(提名) 安娜·奥德尔
introduction: Swedish artist Anna Odell invites us to a grim class reunion with a twist. What happens when old hierarchies and truths are questioned from an unexpected voice? This film investigates how far, too far reality is. It traverses the border between fiction and reality with Odell playing the main character, using her own identity and life story to go into unspoken and invisible hierarchical structure. By processing the story in multiple layers, the complexity of power and exclusion is revealed and the dynamics of the group is exposed.
